intro_bio: I'm currently a Junior at the University of Texas at Austin,
pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.
My passions lie in full-stack development, machine learning,
and AI, along with a drive to push the boundaries of what's possible.

section.title: ~/About
section.description: Brief information about me and some of my interests.

bio: I am currently an undergraduate student at the University of Texas at Austin pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science. I have recently completed internships at Medex Surgical, where I developed an inventory management system, and iCode, where I taught STEM education and assisted students with learning programming languages such as Java and Python. I am also a Research Fellow at the Autonomous Robotics Laboratory, where I work on robotics programming using GPT-4, Python, and C++.

I have a strong interest in full-stack development, machine learning, and AI. I'm constantly looking for opportunities to apply my technical skills to impactful projects, like creating a Chrome extension using OpenAIâ€™s GPT-3.5 or integrating AI into real-world applications. Outside of my technical work, I enjoy working out, watching anime, and spending time with family and friends.

section.title: ~/Education
section.description: Courses that I have completed or am on track to complete.

general.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

section.title: ~/Experience
section.description: My current/past relevant experience. Click [here](/resume) to view my resume.

experience_items.title: Software Engineering Fellow
description: Worked on five AI-focused projects, strengthening my skills in Python and JavaScript while applying concepts to real-world challenges and receiving direct feedback from experienced engineers.
Collaborated with diverse teams in five hackathons, building AI-driven solutions under tight deadlines.

experience_items.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Developed and deployed a VBA and JavaScript-based inventory system that eliminated manual logging and improved data accuracy by 30%, optimizing workflow efficiency across the company.
Authored technical documentation that streamlined system adoption and improved cross-team collaboration.

experience_items.title: Software Engineering Tutor
description: Facilitated STEM education for 20+ student classrooms, adapting complex technical concepts in Java, Python, and HTML to meet individual learning needs, improving student performance and retention.
Identified and resolved a critical curriculum issue by adapting lesson plans, maintaining high student engagement, and preventing revenue loss.

experience_items.title: Research Fellow
description: Led the development of embedded C++ and Python software for autonomous navigation, optimizing path-finding algorithms to reduce manual programming effort by 50%, driving innovation in team strategy.
Utilized test equipment and troubleshooting techniques to enhance system reliability and performance, applying knowledge of the full software development lifecycle during deployment.

section.title: ~/Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

description: Developed a Chrome extension using OpenAI's GPT-3.5 Turbo to generate web page summaries in under 5 seconds, improving productivity and information consumption. Optimized API performance for reduced latency and designed a user-friendly UI for API key input.

Built a full-stack pantry management app using Next.js and Firebase for real-time inventory tracking and recipe suggestions powered by LLaMA AI. Focused on a responsive UI and secure authentication to enhance user experience.
Developed a recycling detection algorithm using YOLO-8, OpenCV, and GPT-4, achieving 78% detection accuracy. Led testing using Azure Kinect for real-time object classification.
